articles.author: Alastair Marsh, Bloomberg
articles.title: Avian influenza spreads to dairy herds in Michigan and Idaho, expert 'wouldn't be surprised if there are infections in cows in Europe too' - Fortune
articles.description: Similar to earlier cases, the virus strain found in Michigan appears to have been introduced by wild birds.
articles.content: Highly pathogenic avian influenza has been discovered in dairy herds in Michigan and Idaho, indicating the virus is spreading into new US states.The National Veterinary Services Laboratories has conf… [+1265 chars]
